text: in season two we have experienced I
think almost every kind of weather I
suppose we didn't get snow really but it
would have been nice it's certainly cold
enough to snow when we were in Chile
filming the episodes in the Atacama we
were camping at 9,000 feet and it was
their winter so it's about 25 degrees
below freezing and we're all sleeping in
money bags these big hoodie things and
you zip them up and once you're in there
you just don't want to move because
getting out of that sleeping bag even
for 30 seconds is a horrifying
experience when it's seven degrees
Fahrenheit and the winds blowing and
it's cold and then we were filming in
the deserts here in the states and and
it was over a hundred degrees Fahrenheit
so so we've had almost a hundred degree
temperature spread from our coldest
episodes who our warmest episode we've
seen almost everything and then we got a
little wet yeah we go we got soaked
repeatedly phenomenal rainstorms in
Australia the heaviest rain they've had
in 35 years the week we were there
filming so it made it quite challenging
especially with the motorcycle trying to
get the motorcycle through the flooded
rivers and steve was driving and we're
going down this kind of dirt track where
there were some heavily flooded sections
and but the engine is fairly low to the
ground on our a motorcycle and you don't
really want to get a hot engine full of
muddy water especially cold muddy water
so we went through the first one fairly
slowly and actually made it through ok
Steve guys oh that was easy i'm going to
let's open it up for the next one and so
that we get to the next flooded section
he just took it at full speed and it was
at exactly the right speed so all the
water kind of hydroplaned up over the
front of the bike and went right into my
face and i actually my mouth was
actually full of disgusting filthy muddy
dirty river street road good times yeah
for you yeah I I you know I I didn't
want to be rude and laugh because I
didn't want to actually like blow a
gasket or something but
it was this that was fun so yes we do
have fun it was fun three times
